summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 2.1°C) and drier conditions in rainfall (down 0.5 mm).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1478 m), light levels (up 8769 lux), feels like temperature (up 4.0°C), and outside temperature (up 3.4°C) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 4.2m lower than yesterday, 859.8m lower than the past week, 1477.9m lower than the past month.

The cloud levels yesterday fell between 765m minimum and 2220m maximum, with an average of 1261.5m; weekly and monthly averages were marginally higher at 2120m and 2740m.
cloud levels.summary: A high cloud base will mean mostly sunny conditions.

summary.summary: Inside; temperature should feel pleasantly mild. Outside; the temperature will feel nicely warm and pleasant. Also, a humid atmosphere. Possible light showers, a high cloud base will mean mostly sunny conditions, and some sunny spells will occur. Low pressure may lead to stormy or rainy weather.
